text: Madho Singh (born 1 July 1929) is an Indian wrestler. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Indian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of India Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:People from Hoshiarpur district
title: Madho Singh
